item.title: 关于 DeepSeek 大跌的 17 点思考
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 从波哥大到北极，特朗普看到了经济强国的力量
item.description: 从南美到北极，全世界都在接受特朗普理论的速成培训。【原文：From South America to the Arctic, the world is getting a crash course in the Trump doctrine.】

item.title: 上周买入 VIX 看涨期权的交易者可免受大跌影响
item.description: 周一全球科技股大跌，仅英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.【原文：Traders who picked up cheap VIX call options last week are getting some protection from Monday’s global tech selloff that erased more than $400 billion in market value from Nvidia Corp. alone.】

item.title: DeepSeek 担忧冲击华尔街，科技股暴跌
item.description: DeepSeek 人工智能移动应用程序上的欢迎词。摄影师：安德烈-鲁达科夫/布鲁姆伯格【原文：A welcome message on the DeepSeek artificial intelligence mobile app. Photographer: Andrey Rudakov/Bloomberg】

item.title: 2024 年底美国新房销售跃升，第二次实现年度增长
item.description: 由于客户利用建筑商提供的优惠政策，美国新房的销售量在 2024 年 12 月达到了高点，从而导致购买量连续第二年增长。【原文：Sales of new US homes ended 2024 on a high note in December as customers took advantage of incentives from builders, leading to a second straight year of increased purchases.】

item.title: 拉脱维亚总理所属政党支持卡扎克出任央行行长： LSM
item.description: 据拉脱维亚公共广播公司（LSM）报道，拉脱维亚总理埃维卡-西利纳（Evika Silina）领导的新团结党将提名马丁斯-卡扎克（Martins Kazaks）连任央行行长，因为三党联盟未能找到接替他的人选，但该公司并未说明从何处获得这一消息。【原文：Latvian Prime Minister Evika Silina’s New Unity party will nominate Martins Kazaks for a second term as central bank governor after the three-party coalition failed to find a candidate to replace him, public broadcaster LSM reported without saying where it got the information.】

item.title: 中国人工智能初创企业颠覆股市，科技巨头接受现实检验
item.description: 中国初创公司 DeepSeek 动摇了只有少数拥有巨额预算的公司才能在人工智能领域竞争的信念，并有可能挑战那些以高额估值回报最大参与者的投资案例。【原文：Chinese startup DeepSeek has shaken the belief that only a few firms with huge budgets can compete in the artificial intelligence field — potentially challenging an investment case that rewarded the biggest players with rich valuations.】

item.title: 俄罗斯石油制裁意味着中东原油多年来最坚挺
item.description: 抢购被制裁的俄罗斯石油的替代货物，已将中东原油价格推高至与全球基准价格相比的异常溢价。【原文：The rush to buy replacement cargoes for sanctioned Russian oil has pushed Middle Eastern crude prices to an unusual premium to the global benchmark.】

item.title: 纽约市废除出租车保险条例修订版中的 "有偿付能力 "要求
item.description: 优步科技公司（Uber Technologies Inc. ）警告说，这项规定可能会导致数千名司机没有保险，纽约市正在收回一项规则修改提案，该提案要求出租车和共享出行司机必须由一家 "有偿付能力且负责任的 "保险公司承保。【原文：New York City is walking back a proposed rule change that would have required taxi and rideshare drivers to be covered by a “solvent and responsible” insurance carrier, after Uber Technologies Inc. warned the mandate risked leaving thousands of drivers uninsured.】

item.title: 莫桑比克在骚乱中降低关键利率和储备金要求
item.description: 莫桑比克央行延长了自2017年以来最长的宽松周期，并降低了商业贷款人需要存入央行的准备金比例，以帮助提振因选举后动荡而受到冲击的经济。【原文：Mozambique’s central bank extended its longest easing cycle since 2017 and reduced the ratio of reserves that commercial lenders need to deposit with it, to help boost its economy that’s been shaken by post-election unrest.】

item.title: 交易员称 DeepSeek 对美国高价科技股构成真正威胁
item.description: 中国 DeepSeek 的到来正在引发投资者对美国科技股是否配得上其高估值的担忧。【原文：The arrival of China’s DeepSeek is fanning concerns among investors over whether US tech stocks deserve their rich valuations.】

item.title: 阿布扎比鹰山公司计划投资 60 亿美元建设格鲁吉亚项目，以推动全球发展
item.description: 总部位于阿布扎比的开发商 Eagle Hills Properties LLC 正深化其国际业务，计划斥资 60 亿美元在格鲁吉亚建设项目。【原文：Abu Dhabi-based developer Eagle Hills Properties LLC is deepening its international foray with a $6 billion plan to build projects in Georgia.】

item.title: Vanguard 称公司债券对投资者来说是 "实实在在的交易
item.description: Vanguard Group Inc.的数据显示，随着市场趋于稳定以及利率上升提高了回报率，公司债券可能连续第七年超过国债。【原文：Corporate bonds are likely to outstrip Treasuries for a seventh straight year as the market steadies and elevated interest rates bolster returns, according to Vanguard Group Inc.】

item.title: 用户激增，DeepSeek 难以维持人工智能聊天机器人的在线运行
item.description: DeepSeek 表示，它正在调查在新用户急于下载中国人工智能聊天机器人后发生的中断服务和阻止注册的事件。【原文：DeepSeek said that it’s investigating an outage that disrupted service and prevented signups after new users rushed to download the Chinese artificial intelligence chatbot.】

item.title: 加蓬美元债券在惠誉下调评级深至垃圾级后下滑
item.description: 在惠誉评级公司（Fitch Ratings）将加蓬评级下调至垃圾级后，加蓬的美元债券十天来首次下跌。【原文：Gabon’s dollar bonds fell for the first day in 10 after Fitch Ratings downgraded the country deeper into junk.】

item.title: 工党增税将推动英国向欧洲式国家靠拢
item.description: 英国不断增加的税收负担将使其财政收入达到欧洲其他国家的水平，这标志着工党新政府向欧洲大陆的大国迈出了决定性的一步。【原文：Britain’s rising tax burden is set to bring revenues in line with the level seen elsewhere in Europe, marking a decisive step under the new Labour government toward the bigger states seen on the Continent.】

item.title: 纽蒙特以 4.25 亿美元将加拿大矿山出售给发现银矿公司
item.description: 纽蒙特公司（Newmont Corp. ）在收购纽克雷斯特矿业公司（Newcrest Mining Ltd.）之后，将推进资产剥离计划，以高达 4.25 亿美元的价格出售其位于安大略省的波丘派恩金矿。【原文：Newmont Corp. will sell its Porcupine gold mine in Ontario for as much as $425 million as it pushes ahead with a plan to offload assets following its acquisition of Newcrest Mining Ltd.】

item.title: 淡水河谷股价下跌 170 亿美元，铁矿石暴跌阻碍扭亏为盈
item.description: 中国经济疲软和铁矿石价格下跌导致淡水河谷公司股价下跌，使投资者对困扰世界顶级炼钢原料供应商之一的不确定性保持警惕。【原文：A weaker China economy and battered iron ore prices have helped drive down Vale SA’s stock, making investors wary of uncertainties plaguing one of the world’s top suppliers of the steelmaking ingredient.】

item.title: DeepSeek 引发人工智能疑虑后，电力供应商随大科技公司下跌
item.description: 全球科技股的大跌所引发的震荡已超出了芯片制造商和 "华丽七侠 "的范畴。【原文：A selloff in global technology stocks is causing shockwaves beyond chipmakers and the Magnificent Seven.】

item.title: 斗山集团在布拉格启动首次公开募股，着眼于核能计划
item.description: 捷克蒸汽轮机制造商斗山斯柯达动力公司（Doosan Skoda Power AS）启动了首次公开募股，并在能源行业订单的推动下，展望了高股息和快速盈利增长的前景。【原文：Czech steam-turbine manufacturer Doosan Skoda Power AS launched an initial public offering, touting an outlook for high dividends and rapid earnings growth driven by orders from the energy industry.】

item.title: 英国养老金行业将支持释放盈余现金的计划
item.description: 据报道，英国养老金行业支持政府计划让企业动用目前被锁在主要雇员退休基金中的数十亿英镑盈余。【原文：Britain’s pensions industry is backing reported government plans to let companies tap the multi-billion pound surpluses that are currently locked up in major retirement funds for employees.】

item.title: 特朗普意外加征关税引发哥伦比亚股市大跌
item.description: 哥伦比亚比索暴跌，因为该国突然（即使只是短暂的）陷入了与美国的关税战，而美国是哥伦比亚长期的政治盟友和最大的贸易伙伴。【原文：The Colombian peso tumbled as the nation was suddenly, if briefly, thrust into a tariff war with the US, its longtime political ally and largest trading partner.】

item.title: 据说 Mediobanca 质疑 Paschi 交易的战略契合度和价值
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士称，Mediobanca SpA 认为 Banca Monte dei Paschi di Siena SpA 的收购价值不大，因为两家贷款机构的战略并不匹配，而且该公司认为合并不会创造价值。【原文：Mediobanca SpA sees little merit in a takeover by Banca Monte dei Paschi di Siena SpA because the strategies of the two lenders aren’t a good match and it doesn’t believe a combination would create value, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 土耳其希望与沙特阿拉伯达成价值 60 亿美元的武器交易
item.description: 据熟悉内情的土耳其官员透露，土耳其政府希望与沙特阿拉伯达成一项价值 60 亿美元的防务协议，沙特可能会购买军舰、坦克和导弹。【原文：Turkey’s government is hoping to reach a $6 billion defense deal with Saudi Arabia that could see the kingdom buy warships, tanks and missiles, according to Turkish officials familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 纵横交错的石油贸易使特朗普的加拿大关税计划复杂化
item.description:
重新安排供应路线的难度意味着市场可能与以往大同小异，只是成本更高。【原文：

The difficulty of rerouting supplies means the market may look much the same — just with higher costs.

】

item.title: 印度央行采取措施通过购买债券增加现金
item.description: 印度央行将进行公开市场债券购买，并进行买卖互换外汇拍卖，以增加银行系统的流动性。【原文：India’s central bank will conduct open market bond purchases and undertake buy-sell swap forex auction to augment liquidity in the banking system.】

item.title: 微策略公司购买更多比特币，同时增加集资工具
item.description: 微策略公司（MicroStrategy Inc）在宣布提前赎回可转换票据并批准增加授权普通股数量的计划后，购买了 11 亿美元的比特币。【原文：MicroStrategy Inc. bought $1.1 billion of Bitcoin, after announcing plans for the early redemption of convertible notes and approving an increase to amount of authorized common shares.】

item.title: 中国制造的电动汽车受到贸易限制后，特斯拉和宝马起诉欧盟
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的特斯拉公司（Tesla）和宝马汽车公司（BMW AG）起诉了欧盟行政机构，这是继中国汽车制造商起诉欧盟对进口电动汽车征收最高达 45% 的关税之后的又一诉讼案。【原文：Elon Musk’s Tesla and BMW AG have sued the European Union’s executive, adding to a flurry of cases by Chinese carmakers attacking tariffs peaking at 45% on imports of electric vehicles into the bloc.】

item.title: 兰特因政治风险和美国关税威胁领跌新兴市场
item.description: 由于南非两大执政党之间的政治分歧扩大，兰特兑美元汇率创下两周来最大跌幅，这加剧了人们对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普关税威胁的担忧。【原文：The rand fell the most in two weeks against the dollar as a political rift between South Africa’s two main governing parties widened, adding to growing concerns about US President Donald Trump’s tariff threats.】

item.title: 特朗普的 "星际之门 "项目距离富士康威斯康星州有一百万英里之遥
item.description: 欢迎收看 Tech In Depth，这是我们改版后的每日时事通讯，由彭博社全球记者提供有关科技商业的报道和分析。今天，奥斯汀-卡尔（Austin Carr）将探讨名为 "星际之门"（Stargate）的人工智能基础设施提案，并指出在特朗普总统的第一个任期内，一个备受瞩目的科技项目并没有达到预期目标。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our revamped daily newsletter with reporting and analysis about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Austin Carr looks at the AI infrastructure proposal called Stargate and points out that a much-heralded tech project during President Trump’s first term in office didn’t live up to its billing.】
